DOC.brief_summary: This open-label , randomize , two-period , two-treatment ( single dose 10 mg SHR3824 fast fed ) , crossover study conduct evaluate effect high-fat meal pharmacokinetics SHR3824 mass balance study 12 healthy subject .
DOC.brief_title: Effect High-fat Meal Pharmacokinetics SHR3824 Mass Balance Study Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: Healthy . BMI 1825 kg/m2 . History clinically significant illness . History alcohol drug abuse .
